readme:
# Atom Toothpaste 2 Theme

An enhancement of the original Toothpaste theme with more differentiation between elements.  I liked the original theme, but almost everything was white, especially in HTML and SCSS, which I use a lot.  So I kept the original author's palette and added some more scope selectors for HTML, HTML Angular JS, SCSS, and JS. 

Original theme, available for several editors: http://imcatnoone.github.io/toothpaste/

##HTML
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smlombardi/toothpaste2/master/screenshots/html.jpg)


##SCSS
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smlombardi/toothpaste2/master/screenshots/scss.jpg)

##JS
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smlombardi/toothpaste2/master/screenshots/js.jpg)

##Typescript
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smlombardi/toothpaste2/master/screenshots/ts.jpg)

Font in screenshots is Operator Mono Light.
